examples.example: 每次放假我都会和家人一起去游览祖国的大好河山。

translate.english: Every time I have a vacation, I will go to visit the great mountains and rivers of the motherland with my family.

examples.example: 每次快到放假的时候，同学们都格外兴奋和期待。

translate.english: Every time when it is almost time for the holiday, the students are extremely excited and expectant.

examples.example: 放假的时候，我喜欢去图书馆安静地阅读自己喜欢的书籍。

translate.english: When on vacation, I like to go to the library to read my favorite books quietly.
